materials.raw_text:
B (Boron) - 0.5 g 
 Ce (Cerium) - 2.5 g 
 Cr (Chromium) - 0.5 g 
 Tc (Technetium) - 0.5 g

sourcing.instructions:
B (Boron) - Purchased from chemical supply companies or online retailers specializing in laboratory chemicals. 
 Ce (Cerium) - Available at specialized metal suppliers or chemical distributors. 
 Cr (Chromium) - Obtain from metal suppliers or chemical supply stores. 
 Tc (Technetium) - Requires a license; can be sourced from nuclear material suppliers or specialized laboratories.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 
 2. In a clean, dry container, combine the measured Boron, Cerium, Chromium, and Technetium. 
 3. Mix thoroughly using a mortar and pestle or a mechanical mixer until a uniform powder is achieved.
